thread.title: Watch: UGA signee Mark Webb has excellent all-around game
thread.title_full: Watch: UGA signee Mark Webb has excellent all-around game

title: Watch: UGA signee Mark Webb has excellent all-around game
text:
Manage Watch: UGA signee Mark Webb has excellent all-around game Georgia signee Mark Webb's senior highlights show why he was so highly thought of by schools and the industry during the recruiting process. Not a member? Try a seven-day FREE trial to VIP access to Dawgs247! 
The 6-foot-2, 200-pound Webb recently released his senior highlights where the case can be made that he has as much or more all-around potential at the position as anyone. The four-minute, six-second reel shows Webb doing everything a receiver is asked to do. He beats opposing defenses over the top, runs crisp routes, makes the tough catches in tight spots, runs well after the catch, and is a physical blocker. 
Things like that are why he's thought of so highly. Webb was ranked as the 134th overall prospect and as the 22nd wide receiver in the 2017 class. He was also seen as the sixth-ranked prospect in Pennsylvania. 
(What's next for the Bulldogs? Make sure you're in the loop -- take a few moments to sign up for our FREE Bulldogs Newsletter! ) Author
